name: Battlesnake Server Status
description: A dashboard to monitor your Battlesnake server's performance. It's important to keep all responses to the `/move` endpoint under 500ms. Furthermore, it's possible that your snake may be in multiple concurrent matches at the same time. It's important to make sure you server and web application are running smoothly to keep you in the game!

rawConfiguration.text:
# üêç Battlesnake Server Status

When developing a battlesnake and hosting it on a server, it's important to consider the following concepts:

* Battlesnakes may be playing [multiple games at once](https://docs.battlesnake.com/guides/tips#consider-concurrency-and-use-game-ids)
* Servers should [always be online](https://docs.battlesnake.com/guides/tips#keep-your-battlesnake-server-running) and ready to play at any time
* Most importantly, the server [must respond within `500ms`](https://docs.battlesnake.com/guides/tips#dont-take-too-long-to-respond) or the Battlesnake's move will be chosen at random!

This dashboard should help provide the necessary insights to ensure that a Battlesnake server is set up for success.

## Helpful Links
* [Battlesnake API docs](https://docs.battlesnake.com/)
* [List of starter projects](https://docs.battlesnake.com/references/starter-projects)
* [Spring 2022 League](https://play.battlesnake.com/league/spring-league-2022/)
* [New Relic APM docs](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/apm/new-relic-apm/getting-started/introduction-apm)

widgets.title: Time consumed by top web transactions

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 second) * 100 FROM Metric WHERE (transactionType = 'Web') AND (transactionName IN ('WebTransaction/Expressjs/POST//move', 'WebTransaction/Expressjs/GET//', 'WebTransaction/Expressjs/GET/(not found)', 'WebTransaction/Expressjs/POST//start', 'WebTransaction/Expressjs/POST//end')) FACET `transactionName` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 hour AGO TIMESERIES EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond) AS 'Transmit bytes per second', average(receiveBytesPerSecond) AS 'Receive bytes per second' FROM NetworkSample TIMESERIES auto
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE request.uri = '/move' LIMIT MAX SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES 1 minute
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE request.uri IN ('/move', '/start', '/end', '/') LIMIT MAX FACET request.uri
SELECT average(loadAverageOneMinute) as '1 minute', average(loadAverageFiveMinute) AS '5 minutes', average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) AS '15 minutes' FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(cpuPercent) AS 'CPU used %' FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES auto
SELECT average(diskFreePercent) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(memoryUsedPercent) AS 'Memory used %' FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES auto
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'Web' FROM Metric WHERE (transactionType = 'Web') FACET `transactionType` LIMIT 5 SINCE 1 hour AGO TIMESERIES
